channel.title: CMD problems
channel.description:
ok well. i have my server up and running it just, when people log in, they automaticaly disconnect. and sometimes will just shut server totaly down. any help with this?
people CAN log into it, just after like 5 trys.
also. when i go to kick or ban people, it doesnt do anything for like a minute or two.
